about_the_game:
Starter Pack Includes:

  • Sarkhet, Death's Envoy hero with unlockable card set
  • The Siegebreaker boss with unlockable card set
  • 15 Labyrinth Combo Card Packs (Each card pack contains a random mix of 5 Hero and/or Boss cards for Labyrinth. At least 1 card is guaranteed to be Rare or higher.)

Notes:

Limit 1 Starter Pack per account. Players who already own Sarkhet, Death's Envoy will be granted 3000 Stardust instead. Likewise, players who already own The Siegebreaker will be granted 3000 Stardust.
detailed_description:
Starter Pack Includes:

  • Sarkhet, Death's Envoy hero with unlockable card set
  • The Siegebreaker boss with unlockable card set
  • 15 Labyrinth Combo Card Packs (Each card pack contains a random mix of 5 Hero and/or Boss cards for Labyrinth. At least 1 card is guaranteed to be Rare or higher.)

Notes:

Limit 1 Starter Pack per account. Players who already own Sarkhet, Death's Envoy will be granted 3000 Stardust instead. Likewise, players who already own The Siegebreaker will be granted 3000 Stardust.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10+
  • Processor: MacBookAir+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MacBookAir+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound is sufficient
  • Additional Notes: Disk space requirement will increase as content is added to the game throughout Early Access

name: Labyrinth - Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2GHz+ (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Disk space requirement will increase as content is added to the game throughout Early Access

short_description: The Labyrinth - Starter Pack includes 1 Hero and 1 Boss, as well as 15 Combo Card Packs for Labyrinth.
